mil3.3.2:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘purima koti na pannayati’ti, tassa opammam karohi”ti.
mil3.3.2:1.3: “Yatha, maharaja, puriso parittam bijam pathaviyam nikkhipeyya, tato ankuro utthahitva anupubbena vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitva phalam dadeyya.
mil3.3.2:1.4: Tato bijam gahetva puna ropeyya, tatopi ankuro utthahitva anupubbena vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitva phalam dadeyya.
mil3.3.2:1.7: “Evameva kho, maharaja, addhanassapi purima koti na pannayati”ti.
mil3.3.2:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kukkutiya andam bhaveyya, andato kukkuti kukkutiya andanti.
mil3.3.2:2.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, addhanassapi purima koti na pannayati”ti.
mil3.3.2:3.2: Thero pathaviya cakkam likhitva milindam rajanam etadavoca—
mil3.3.2:3.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, imani cakkani vuttani bhagavata ‘cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana, vedanapaccaya tanha, tanhapaccaya upadanam, upadanapaccaya kammam, kammato puna cakkhum jayati’ti.
mil3.3.2:4.2: mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso, phassapaccaya vedana, vedanapaccaya tanha, tanhapaccaya upadanam, upadanapaccaya kammam, kammato puna mano jayati’ti.
mil3.3.2:4.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, addhanassapi purima koti na pannayati”ti.
